function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Decreased spontaneous interactions due to COVID-19 social distancing measures","Impact":"Reduced social connectedness, potential increase in loneliness and isolation","Mitigation":"Promotion of virtual social interactions, small group gatherings adhering to guidelines","Technologies":"Virtual meeting platforms, social media, video conferencing tools","People":"Urban dwellers, especially those living alone","Owner":"Local authorities, community organizations"},{"Description":"Formalized social control as a result of COVID-19 measures","Impact":"Potential loss of personal freedoms, increased surveillance, and social stratification","Mitigation":"Transparency in decision-making, community engagement in policy development, protection of civil liberties","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, data privacy tools, policy transparency frameworks","People":"General urban population, marginalized communities","Owner":"Government, community organizations"},{"Description":"Impact of COVID-19 on mental health in urban areas","Impact":"Potential increase in fear, anxiety, and mental illness due to social isolation and prolonged stress","Mitigation":"Access to mental health support services, promotion of community resilience and peer support networks","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, mental health apps, community support forums","People":"Urban dwellers, especially vulnerable populations","Owner":"Healthcare providers, community organizations"}]}
